definition: both ends (of a stick etc)/two extremes
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: Forged module, "H"type section, two fist-end type, drum braking.
sentences.chinese: 鍛壓成型，工字形斷面，兩端拳式，鼓式制動器。

sentences.english: The girl tied the ends of the thread.
sentences.chinese: 這女孩把線的兩端結起來。

sentences.english: They are placed on both sides of an imaginary vertical line on the page which goes through the middle of the user’s screen.
sentences.chinese: 他們都被放置在用戶屏幕中間一條虛構垂直線的兩端。

sentences.english: Under the bridge, there lies a valley between steep mountains with a rapid stream flowing through it.
sentences.chinese: 兩端之間，原隔着險峻的山谷，湍急的溪流。

sentences.english: The curved glass lenses at each end of the telescope acted like prisms.
sentences.chinese: 望遠鏡兩端的曲面玻璃鏡頭起到了三棱鏡的作用。

sentences.english: A glass or quartz tube has tungsten electrodes sealed in each end .
sentences.chinese: 兩根鎢絲電極是封在玻璃管或石英管的兩端。

sentences.english: The rifts at both installation holes of the silicon carbide rod ends shall be blocked by asbest rope.
sentences.chinese: 硅碳棒兩端安裝孔處的隙縫應用石棉繩堵塞。

sentences.english: Double-loop elastic bands and put them either side of the hanger to keep clothes from falling down.
sentences.chinese: 在衣架兩端繞兩圈橡皮筋可以防止衣服滑落。

sentences.english: The two ends of the pipeline are connected with the radiator .
sentences.chinese: 管道的兩端與暖氣片相連接。

sentences.english: The powerful design of the front and rear ends highlight the on-road stance of C5 Airscape .
sentences.chinese: 在前後兩端強大的設計上突出的碳五鳥瞰道路的立場。

sentences.english: Clean corroded battery terminals with baking soda and water.
sentences.chinese: 小蘇打水可以清洗腐蝕電池的兩端。

sentences.english: Each of these rod bearings is attached to the ends of the kingpins.
sentences.chinese: 軸承每個這些杆是連接到主銷的兩端軸承。

sentences.english: The two ends of the wire are connected to a split-ring commutator.
sentences.chinese: 導線的兩端聯接到裂環整流器。

sentences.english: Two ends explores standard hewoulszheimerwouls disease. Under tank is specifriend optimized variin the cross-section longitudinwouls glefeel.
sentences.chinese: 兩端採用尺度封頭，罐體上面是優化的變截面縱梁。

sentences.english: Spindle-shaped; broadest near the middle and tapering toward both ends.
sentences.chinese: 形如紡錘狀的，中部最寬，兩端漸細。

sentences.english: A typical fluorescent lamp is a tube with metal electrodes at each end.
sentences.chinese: 日光燈通常是一根兩端裝有金屬電極的管子。

definition: both ends/both parties to a deal
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
deformation/to become deformed/to change shape/to morph
length/duration/accident/right and wrong/good and bad/long and short
